views.markdown: EmojiLibrary is a developer library, and the master library for most of PoomSmart's Emoji tweaks, including algorithms and functionalities that handle any kind of emojis - display as images properly. Developers that want to create emoji-related tweaks would find this useful.
- Fixed interracial handshakes not selected correctly in emoji picker (iOS 13.2+)
- Fixed emoji picker for handholding emojis not rendering correctly (iOS 13.2+)
- Fixed crashing on selecting multi-skinned emojis
- Added basic support for multi-skinned handshake emoji
- Initial support for iOS 15.4 beta emojis
